name: Task Scheduling
description: Two agents must decide who does which household chores. Each has preferences and constraints.

public_info.rule: All tasks must be assigned. Both agents should do equal work.

agent_a_secrets.strategy: Prefers Laundry and Vacuuming. Hates doing Dishes.

agent_b_secrets.strategy: Prefers Dishes and Grocery Shopping. Doesn't mind Vacuuming but hates Laundry.

agreement_criteria.success_condition: Both agents agree on task allocation where all tasks are assigned and work is balanced
agreement_criteria.failure_condition: No agreement reached or tasks remain unassigned
